name: VIDEO: Thousands Celebrate Living Well at Annual 5K
description: Thousands tied up their laces Sunday morning to take part in the ninth annual Live Well San Diego 5K and 1-mile Fun Run.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Thousands tied up their laces Sunday morning to take part in the ninth annual Live Well San Diego 5K and 1-mile Fun Run.
The cost-free County event in partnership with 2-1-1 San Diego and presenting sponsor San Diego County Credit Union, encourages San Diegans of all ages and abilities (and even furry friends) to get outside and move as part of Live Well San Diego’s visions for a region that is Building Better Health, Living Safely, and Thriving.
Awards were presented to top finishers and every participant received a finishers medal and commemorative t-shirt.
The Community Expo featured 80 exhibitors handing out information about local resources and a family fun zone with games and activities.
Event-goers also took part in a dance warm-up and cool-down and group yoga.
Learn more about Live Well San Diego on their website.
